TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AuthenticateEventHandler(object sender, AuthenticateEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AuthenticateEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AuthenticateEventArgs)
public delegate void AuthenticateEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AuthenticateEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: An that contains the event data.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
